thread.title: June F
thread.title_full: Olive Oil Lovers reviewed by June F

author: June F
title: June F
text:
My first bottle of oil arrived from Olive Oil Lovers within days of my order. I have used it several times and am extremely pleased with it. It has such a nice mild flavor.
The customer service folks are also great. Very accommodating and helpful. Olive Oil Lovers gets two thumbs up from me and I will tell my friends about them.
